# List of required github secrets/variables

## Secrests

- DOCKERHUB_USERNAME
- DOCKERHUB_TOKEN
- POSTGRES_USER
- POSTGRES_PASSWORD
- TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN
- TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN
- VPS_HOST
- VPS_USER
- VPS_SSH_KEY

## Variables
- POSTGRES_PORT
- POSTGRES_DB
- TELEGRAM_BOT_WEBHOOK_PORT
- DOCKER_PROJECT_NAME
- DOCKER_PROJECT_FOLDER
- PUBLIC_POSTGRES_PORT
- OWNER_TG_ID
